title: I eat the sh*t out of this Orzo Salad.
description:
This salad uses orzo, the rice-shaped pasta as a base, and then I just throw in some random vegetables with feta cheese and when paired with a basic vinaigrette, it always turns out good.

INGREDIENTS LIST
Salad Base Ingredients
- 224 g (1/2 lb) Orzo
- 100 g dry garbanzo beans, cooked (or 1 can drained)
- 1/4 red onion, thinly sliced
- 8 to 10 brussels sprouts, thinly sliced
- 20 Cherry tomatoes, cut into quarters
- small handful of parsley, chopped
- 60 g Feta cheese

Greek-ish Vinaigrette
- 28 g oil
- 15 g rice wine vinegar
- 5 g mustard
- 1 clove of garlic, zested
- pinch of dry oregano
- pinch of sumac
- 10 cranks black pepper
- Salt to taste
